name: Friendly Fire (itch) (purplesky)
description:
Defend a tiny planet using fire magic with up to 4 players.

Controlls in Lobby:

[Keyboard J / GamePad Button East (A,B,O)] Join

[Keyboard L / GamePad Button South (A/B/X)] Leave

Controlls in Game:

[Keyboard WASD / GamePad Left Stick] Move

[Keyboard Space / GamePad Button South (A/B/X)] Jump

[Left Mouse Button / GamePad Right Trigger] Shoot
